com.foursquare.geo.shapes

Class SimplifiedShapefileGeo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.foursquare.geo.shapes.SimplifiedShapefileGeo

  • public class SimplifiedShapefileGeo
extends java.lang.Object
    The counterpart to ShapefileSimplifier. Once a shapefile is simplified, it can be loaded and used for querying. SimplifiedShapefileGeo shows example usage within an application.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static IndexedValues load(java.net.URL file, java.lang.String labelAttribute, boolean simplifySingleLabelCells)
      Loads a simplified Shapefile

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • load

        public static IndexedValues load(java.net.URL file,
                                 java.lang.String labelAttribute,
                                 boolean simplifySingleLabelCells)
                          throws java.io.IOException
        Loads a simplified Shapefile
        Parameters:
        file - the location of the file. Can be a resource on the classpath.
        labelAttribute - the attribute to return in IndexedValues. Pass the same value used for ShapefileSimplifier.
        simplifySingleLabelCells - generally should be true. when false, checking the IndexedValues.valueForCoordinate(com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.Coordinate) will always check containment within a feature within that cell. When true, if all features within a cell have the same value, that value will always be returned without checking feature containment. Pass the same value used for ShapefileSimplifier.
        Returns:
        an representation of the Shapefile that allows testing the labelAttribute value at a certain point.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the file cannot be loaded
